column1: SOAL
After Timmy . . . . his first salary, he bought presents for his parents
column13: D. kalimat ini menggunakan tenses koordinasi, yaitu after past perfect + past simple

column1: My sister’s husband is known as a . . . . person and we do love him!
column13: C. adjective yang tepat ssuai susunan kata sifat adalah funny (opinion) tall (size) middle-aged (age) Italian (originality)

column1: The operating principles of the telephone . . . they were in the nineteenth century.
column3: are today what they are same
column13: D. digunakan bentuk comparison yang mennunjukkan makna sama atau serupa, yaitu the same as

column1: I talked to the girl ...... car had broken down in front of the shop
column13: B. Kalimat ini membutuhkan connector, untuk melengkapi adjective clause yang menunjukkan makna kepemilikan

column1: We had already visited Bali before SBMPTN was held, ...... ?
column13: A. bentuk tag yang tepat untuk kalimat we had already visited ... adalah hadn’t we

column1: The police were unable to lay charges, ...... insufficient evidence.
column13: C Kalimat tersebut menunjukan cause/sebab. Konjungsi yang tepat adalah ‘owing to’ (diikuti frasa)

column1: If he spoke better English he would look for a job abroad, .... ?
column13: D Induk kalimat tersebut berbentuk conditional, dengan penekanan klausa he would look for a job abroad. Jadi tag questionnya wouldn’t he

column1: They agreed that is easier ...... students in high school than to have them spend money to take remedial college courses
column13: C.Perbandingan ‘than’ yang diikuti to+infinitive, jadi pola yang benar adalah to prepare....than to have

column1: This is .... any other champagne I’ve ever tasted.
column13: D. is merupakan linking verb yang diikuti adjective, adjective ditekankan oleh adverb

column1: Barely ..... to watch the film when the light went off.
column13: C. Kalimat tersebut merupakan kalimat inversi yang diawali dengan Barely, jadi jawabannya adalah had we started

column1: New mothers and fathers are often ..... their parenting
column13: B. Bentuk yang benar prepositional adjective adalah anxious about, adjective capable diikuti preposisi about

column1: She was delighted at .... a new employee in the S.T.A.R Lab.
column13: B. Delighted at diikuti gerund, krna berbentuk passive maka being V3

column1: I recall him ..... about maple sugaring on a farm when he was a kid
column13: C. Kata recall harus diikuti gerund, baik ada objek maupun tidak

column1: ..... by the earth quakes, the village was left uninhabited.
column13: A Kalimat tersebut mengalami reduksasi klausa yang mengandung konjungsi because/for/since/as

column1: After she had already signed a year’s rent for the house, she .... another that she liked much better
column13: D. Pola koordinasi tense dengan konjungsi after bermakna lampau adalah after+past perfect, past simple

column1: A body (B) of volunteers have been (B) organized to aid the helpless (C) in their (D) struggle for survival.
column13: B.have been seharusnya has been karena subyeknya a body

column1: The Library of Congress, with a large number (A) of books in its (B) stacks, attracts (C) students from most every (D) state in the Union.
column13: D.Most every kata moat tidak dapat diikuti denngan every,every saja sudah cukup

column1: Unlike (A) most animals, the turtle (B) lives effortlessly (C) in the water and land (D)
column13: B.The turtle, pernyataan tersebut menunjukkan pernyataan umum,apabila demikian. seharusnya a turtle

column1: I try(A) to figure in(B) the answer of what(C) the function of organization is(D).
column13: B. Figure in figure out: understanding, solve

column1: A heavy(A) snowstorm began here early this morning(B), making(C) the fields similar with(D) midwinter.
column13: D. Seharusnya similar to
